document_data.mainbody:
Farid al-Nisr was a Harper wizard in 1372 DR.
Around 1369 DR, Farid was sent to New Waterdeep in Maztica by High Harper Khelben Arunsun together with his Harper fiancee Lady Syllia Adarbrent and fellow Harper Orist Moonbow. There he was chosen as one of the new Lords of the Borderlands for his integrity and his connections.
Around 1371 DR, Farid and Syllia were back in Waterdeep and they impetuously married before going back to Maztica.
Known to few, Farid was the son of Fahd yn Sarsor al Nisr, a First Yrshelem of the Rundeen.
Farid hated slavery.
